# loader-button



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property       | Attribute       | Description                                    | Type      | Default     |
| -------------- | --------------- | ---------------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `disabled`     | `disabled`      | True if the button is disabled.                | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `loading`      | `loading`       | True gives feedback that something is loading. | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `loadingLabel` | `loading-label` | The label displayed when loading.              | `string`  | `'Loading'` |
| `type`         | `type`          | The button's type.                             | `string`  | `'button'`  |
